What to Expect

Here's how I typically work with new clients and partners.

Initial Consultation

We'll start with a 30-minute discovery call to understand your challenges, goals, and timeline. This helps determine if we're a good fit for working together.

Timeline: Within 48 hours of your inquiry

Proposal & Scope

Based on our conversation, I'll provide a detailed proposal outlining the approach, timeline, deliverables, and investment required.

Timeline: 3-5 business days after consultation

Engagement Kickoff

Once we agree on scope, we'll schedule a kickoff session to align on objectives, establish communication protocols, and begin the strategic work.

Timeline: Within 1 week of signed agreement

Frequently Asked Questions

What size companies do you work with?

I primarily work with B2B companies between $1M and $50M in annual revenue, though I occasionally take on projects with earlier-stage startups and larger enterprises for specific strategic initiatives.

How long are typical engagements?

Strategic consulting projects typically run 6-12 weeks. Executive advisory relationships are ongoing, usually 6-12 months minimum. Speaking engagements are one-time events with 2-4 weeks of preparation.

Do you work with international companies?

Yes, I work with companies globally. Most of my work is conducted remotely, with occasional travel for in-person workshops or presentations when needed.

What industries do you specialize in?

I focus on B2B SaaS, professional services, and tech-enabled businesses. My frameworks are particularly effective for companies with complex sales cycles and enterprise customers.
